blink.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to shut and open your eyes quickly
blink.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: I blinked as I came out into the sunlight.
blink.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: if lights blink, they shine unsteadily or go on and off quickly
blink.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The light on your answering machine is blinking.
blink.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: the action of quickly shutting and opening your eyes
